segments.text: I feel so happy looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, and the children are having fun taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is stretching to reach the cookie jar, it reminds me of my childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, and it's so cute how she's reaching out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside looks so peaceful and beautiful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, but it's not bothering anyone, and that's kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will laugh when she finally realizes what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so clever and sneaky, it's really amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all have a good laugh about this later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just brings back so many happy memories for me.
segments.speaker: PAR
